name: TALENI: Workforce Development
description: Provides barrier removal services to support youth and young adults, specifically ages 18-24, in gaining meaningful engagement. Services include assistance with essential milestones such as obtaining a driver’s license, GED, or high school diploma. Participants are placed at various worksites across the city and receive job readiness training, workshops, and individualized support to prepare them for successful employment and personal growth.

howToGetIt: Call the mainline or send email for more information.
